title: Pbe help please
body: So basically my thread got deleted , I created this new one.Sorry for messing up and not doing it in help and support , So yeah my pbe account doesent work , i did get accepted worked before and i did the right pass and username.It says wrong passwrod/username{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body: I took a look at the account you're posting from and wasn't able to find a pbe account attached.  If you do have a PBE account, it may be to another account that you own.  If you still have any issues you can reach out to us through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416).  Our account team can help individually with recovery!
